title: Military Spouse Day, 2025
summary: The document is a proclamation by President Donald J. Trump, declaring May 9, 2025, as Military Spouse Day. It emphasizes the vital role military spouses play in supporting the Armed Forces and acknowledges their sacrifices, including frequent relocations, separations, and challenges in maintaining employment. The proclamation highlights a significant unemployment rate of 21% among military spouses and a 25% wage gap compared to civilians. It outlines efforts made during the President's administration to improve employment opportunities for military spouses, such as enhancing federal job access and promoting licensure portability. The proclamation calls on the American public to honor military spouses through ceremonies and activities, recognizing their resilience and essential contribution to national defense.
